command.accio.dice.challenge.received: &f%s &ewants to confront you to a dice duel, type &a/dice accept &eto accept the duel. &7(30s timeout)
command.accio.dice.challenge.received_wi: &f%s &ewants to confront you to a &e%s&e duel, type &a/dice accept &eto accept the duel. &7(30s timeout)
command.accio.dice.duel.dramatic_tie: &6&lBoth players rolled the same! It's a dramatic tie!
command.accio.dice.duel.epic_victory: &d&lEPIC! &f%s &dgot a perfect 6 while &f%s &dgot a 1! What a crushing victory!
command.accio.dice.error.invalid_dice: &cInvalid dice type: &f%s&c. Available: d4, d6, d8, d12, d20, d100
command.accio.dice.error.no_challenge: &cYou don't have any pending duel challenges.
command.accio.dice.error.on_cooldown: &cYou must wait &f%d&c more seconds before challenging another duel!
command.accio.dice.error.pending_duel: &cYou already have a pending duel challenge!
command.accio.dice.error.players_only: &cThis command can only be used by players.
command.accio.dice.error.self_challenge: &cYou cannot challenge yourself to a dice duel!
command.accio.dice.error.target_on_coold: &c%s is on cooldown and cannot be challenged for &f%d&c more seconds!
command.accio.dice.help.accept: &e/dice accept &7- Accept a pending duel challenge
command.accio.dice.help.challenge: &e/dice duel <player> &7- Challenge a player to a dice duel
command.accio.dice.help.challenge_dice: &e/dice duel <player> <dice> &7- Challenge with specific dice (d4, d6, d8, d12, d20, d100)
command.accio.dice.help.timeout: &7Challenges expire after 30 seconds. Players have a 60-second cooldown between duels.
command.accio.dice.help.title: &6&lDice Duel Commands:
command.accio.dice.stats.title: &6&l🎲 &f%s's &6Duel Statistics &l🎲
command.accio.feur.error.no_trigger: &cNo one said a trigger word recently. You have been kicked for Feur!
command.accio.feur.error.players_only: &cThis command can only be used by players.
